programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: Bella Swan is on the cusp of her 18th birthday and blissfully happy with her undead beau Edward Cullen. While celebrating her birthday with Edward's family of `vegetarian' vampires, a frightening incident convinces Edward that he's simply too dangerous to be around his sweetheart. He decides to leave the town of Forks in order to ensure her safety - leaving her behind, angry and depressed.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguire's personal life starts to fall apart as he's torn between love and money in Cameron Crowe's metaphor on Americans' need for success and money.

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: A former slave joins forces with the German bounty hunter who freed him and helps hunt down the South's most-wanted criminals, the vicious Brittle brothers, all in the hope of finding his long-lost wife at the plantation where she is still enslaved.

programme.title: Dakota
programme.desc: A woman and her daughter find warmth and companionship when her late husband's combat dog comes to live on their farm. However, they must soon band together when a corrupt sheriff does whatever it takes to get his hands on the family's land.

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: When a financial crisis hits a family, they are forced to sell their beloved dog to a local duke. However, the dog isn't happy with her new living arrangements and soon sets out on a 500-mile journey back to the home she loves.

programme.title: Nancy Drew and the Hidden Staircase
programme.desc: For 16-year-old Nancy Drew, life in a small town is dull. She longs for excitement, adventure, and the chance to make a difference. Nancy gets that opportunity when she is asked to help solve the ghostly activity at the Twin Elms mansion.

programme.title: Daphne & Velma
programme.desc: Daphne and Velma, two mystery-solving teens, investigate what is causing some of the brightest students at their high school to become "zombie-fied."

programme.title: The Railway Children Return
programme.desc: A group of children are evacuated to a Yorkshire village during the Second World War, where they encounter a young soldier who, like them, is far away from home.

programme.title: Lyle, Lyle, Crocodile
programme.desc: When the Primm family moves to New York City, their young son, Josh, struggles to adapt to his new school and new friends. All of that changes when he discovers Lyle, a singing crocodile that loves baths, caviar and great music.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: When a boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home, his imagination runs wild as his life begins to change in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: The loveable rodents Alvin, Simon and Theodore must enrol in school when their human friend Dave is hospitalised. In addition to bearing the unwelcome attention of bullies, they also discover that the school's music department is threatened by financial cuts. their attempts to save it are hampered by a group of female chipmunks, the Chipettes, who are managed by the Chipmunks' sworn enemy, Ian.

programme.desc: When a single mother and her two children move to a new town, they soon discover that they have a connection to the original Ghostbusters and their grandfather's secret legacy.

programme.title: Harriet the Spy
programme.desc: A precocious child who hopes to be a writer lands in hot water with her classmates after her secret notebook is stolen.

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer's new housing sub-division deep in the Oregon wilderness, faces some unusual opposition by a set of local woodland creatures who do not want their homes disturbed.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Blueback
programme.desc: After befriending a wild blue groper, a girl finds inspiration from her activist mother to save the magnificent fish from poachers.

programme.title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
programme.desc: A magical animal rescuer gives young Emily a little red puppy that quickly grows into a 10-foot hound. With her single mother away on business, Emily and her fun but impulsive uncle set out on an adventure that takes a bite out of the Big Apple.

programme.title: Wickensburg
programme.desc: When a mother and her son move to the small town of Wickensburg, they discover a terrible secret and must race against time to save the town from an evil industrialist.

Our hero must save his sister, as they battle it out against lifelike 3-D monsters, completing each progressively harder level and ultimately trying to save the youth of the world.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: David, a 7-year-old Korean-American boy, gets his life turned upside down when his father decides to move their family to rural Arkansas and start a farm in the mid-1980s, in this charming and unexpected take on the American Dream.

programme.title: Carry on Nurse
programme.desc: Set in Haven Hospital where a certain men's ward is causing more havoc than the whole hospital put together. The formidable Matron's debut gives the patients a chill every time she walks past, with only Reckitt standing up to her. There's a major who is a constant nuisance, a bumbling nurse, a romance between Ted York and Nurse Denton and Bell who wants his bunyon removed straight away.

programme.title: Carry on Cruising
programme.desc: A sea captain about to set sail discovers that his regular shipmates have all defected. In their place are an inexperienced and over-eager bunch who wreak havoc during a Mediterranean cruise, sailing a tricky course through a sea of double entendres, until they finally reach a port in Spain.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: Lieutenant Colonel Kirby Yorke heads a cavalry post on the Texas side of the Rio Grande, defending settlers against Apaches launching raids from the Mexican side of the river. When Yorke's 16-year-old son, Jeff --- who he has not seen since he was a baby -- shows up at the post as one of the new recruits, he treats him more harshly than the others. Things are further complicated when Yorke's estranged wife, Kathleen, returns to take her son home.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Epic film set in America in 1757, where the French and the English are fighting for power, with the help of the Huron and Mohican Native Americans respectively. Centre stage in the film is Hawkeye, the orphan of murdered settlers, who was raised by Mohicans, is torn between two cultures, and falls for Cora Munro - the daughter of one of the British commanders.

programme.title: Oh! What a Lovely War
programme.desc: A series of episodes set in World War I England reveals the absurdity of war - mankind's most destructive activity.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby
programme.desc: A wealthy 1920s bootlegger devotes his life to improving his social status and renewing a love affair with a now-married woman.

programme.title: The Spy Who Came in From the Cold
programme.desc: On his last mission, a burnt-out British agent in Berlin is to infiltrate East German intelligence, as he's recruited by an ambitious Communist operative, but his real role soon becomes all too apparent.

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: A wealthy law student and a lower-class music student meet and fall in love while at Harvard. In the face of parental disapproval, they marry and are blissfully happy, until they discover that she has a fatal disease.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroder's composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling)', sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: Six southern belles deal with marriages, deaths, births and everything in between by staying strong as steel on the inside, and immaculate on the outside, thanks to therapeutic visits to their local beauty salon.

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: A former slave joins forces with the German bounty hunter who freed him and helps hunt down the South's most-wanted criminals, the vicious Brittle brothers, all in the hope of finding his long-lost wife at the plantation where she is still enslaved.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

In their place are an inexperienced and over-eager bunch who wreak havoc during a Mediterranean cruise, sailing a tricky course through a sea of double entendres, until they finally reach a port in Spain.

programme.title: The Card Counter
programme.desc: William Tell is a gambler and former serviceman who sets out to reform a young man seeking revenge on a mutual enemy from their past. Tell just wants to play cards. His spartan existence on the casino trail is shattered when he is approached by Cirk, a vulnerable and angry young man seeking help to execute his plan for revenge on a military colonel. Tell sees a chance at redemption through his relationship with Cirk.

programme.desc: Six southern belles deal with marriages, deaths, births and everything in between by staying strong as steel on the inside, and immaculate on the outside, thanks to therapeutic visits to their local beauty salon.

programme.title: Chinatown
programme.desc: In 1930s LA, a detective investigates a seemingly straightforward case of adultery and uncovers murder and scandal. However, the case is complicated by a femme fatale who leads the gumshoe further into a dangerous and complex web of violence and corruption.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Vincent Vega and Jules Winnfield are hitmen with a penchant for philosophical discussions. In this ultra-hip, multi-strand crime movie, their storyline is interwoven with those of their boss, gangster Marsellus Wallace; his actress wife, Mia; struggling boxer Butch Coolidge; master fixer Winston Wolfe and a nervous pair of armed robbers, "Pumpkin" and "Honey Bunny".

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: The Duellists
programme.desc: Two French officers wage a long-running feud during the Napoleonic wars. Based on a Joseph Conrad story.

programme.title: Young at Heart
programme.desc: Laurie Tuttle and Barney Sloan fall in love despite the presence of her fiancé, Alex Burke. Sloan is a musician called in to score a comedy Burke is writing who steals Tuttle's heart, but since she has two equally attractive sisters, a happy ending is guaranteed.

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: When Rydell new boy Michael meets hot Pink Lady Stephanie he is instantly smitten, but Michael's a geek and top T-Bird Johnny wants Stephanie back. Will an image change help him get the girl?

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Midge Kelly steps into the ring to defend his world title and then tells his rise to fame through flashback. A drifter with his brother Connie, his only way out of the poverty of the Depression is to climb into the ring, under the guidance of trainer Tommy Haley. As he rises to the top, he tramples on everyone who's helped him, from Haley to his first wife Emma.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A Madison Avenue photographer transforms a timid saleswoman into one of the fashion world's most glamorous models. The Gershwin-scored film includes `How Long Has This Been Going On?, He Loves and She Loves, and `S Wonderful'.

programme.title: The Duellists
programme.desc: Two French officers wage a long-running feud during the Napoleonic wars. Based on a Joseph Conrad story.

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: A chauffeur's naive daughter falls for the playboy son of her father's wealthy employers, to the dismay of the young man's business-minded older brother. The girl is heartbroken when she realises the man has only been toying with her affections, and her father sends her to a French school to repair the damage. She returns a glittering and refined young lady, at last awakening the son's interest.

programme.title: Chinatown
programme.desc: In 1930s LA, a detective investigates a seemingly straightforward case of adultery and uncovers murder and scandal. However, the case is complicated by a femme fatale who leads the gumshoe further into a dangerous and complex web of violence and corruption.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywood's move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an unsophisticated single mother who stumbles upon an environmental cover-up. While working for a lawyer, she is puzzled by an old case and decides to do some research of her own. She discovers that a chemical company knowingly polluted the local area, and with the help of the lawyer launches a class action to sue the company for damages.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: A normally well-behaved teenager goes wild while his parents are out of town. In charge at his parents' smart house, the 17-year-old sees the chance to make a fast buck when the prostitute, on the run from a scary pimp, appears at his door. He takes her in, and, following his school's entrepreneurial teachings, lets her turn the house into a brothel.

programme.title: Young at Heart
programme.desc: Laurie Tuttle and Barney Sloan fall in love despite the presence of her fiancé, Alex Burke. Sloan is a musician called in to score a comedy Burke is writing who steals Tuttle's heart, but since she has two equally attractive sisters, a happy ending is guaranteed.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Midge Kelly steps into the ring to defend his world title and then tells his rise to fame through flashback. A drifter with his brother Connie, his only way out of the poverty of the Depression is to climb into the ring, under the guidance of trainer Tommy Haley. As he rises to the top, he tramples on everyone who's helped him, from Haley to his first wife Emma.

programme.title: Carry on Cleo
programme.desc: After being trounced in Europe, Caesar dispatches Antony to forge an alliance with Ptolemy, who is squabbling with Cleopatra for the Egyptian throne, but the plan goes awry as Antony is captivated by Cleopatra's asp, and together they plot Caesar's downfall.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: Six years after creating Facebook in his dorm room, Mark Zuckerberg becomes a billionaire, but his great success leads to personal and legal complications.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: A chauffeur's naive daughter falls for the playboy son of her father's wealthy employers, to the dismay of the young man's business-minded older brother. The girl is heartbroken when she realises the man has only been toying with her affections, and her father sends her to a French school to repair the damage. She returns a glittering and refined young lady, at last awakening the son's interest.

She discovers that a chemical company knowingly polluted the local area, and with the help of the lawyer launches a class action to sue the company for damages.

programme.title: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: A sweet boy from a poor family dreams of finding one of five golden tickets hidden inside chocolate bar wrappers which will admit him to the eccentric and reclusive Willy Wonka's magical factory. One after another, tickets are discovered by ghastly children - but will the lad find the last remaining one and have all his dreams come true?

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Risky Business

He takes her in, and, following his school's entrepreneurial teachings, lets her turn the house into a brothel.

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: In a land where beauty is preserved by innocence, two young people become ensnared in the battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Delivery Man
programme.desc: An amiable slacker discovers that the anonymous sperm donations he made to a fertility clinic 20 years ago resulted in 533 offspring and that 142 of them have now filed a lawsuit to learn his identity.

programme.title: Mass
programme.desc: Years after a horrible tragedy turned their lives upside down, two couples, one, the parents of a victim of school shooting and the other, parents of the perpetrator, sit down to have a painful and heart-wrenching conversation about grief and loss.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: Elisha is a dogged reporter who wants to break front-page news. After old-school columnist Nick teams up with her, she stumbles upon a bigger conspiracy.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: A chain of events, set off by Edward and Bella's wedding, honeymoon and birth of a child, yields a shocking development for Jacob.

programme.title: King Richard
programme.desc: Venus and Serena Williams came from an unlikely background to dominate the world of tennis. Taking a look these tennis superstars and how they became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard Williams.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: We find out just how gifted psychic Elise Rainier is, she reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a teenage girl who is been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Three student film-makers, Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard and Mike Williams, set off into the woods near Burkitsville, Maryland, in search of the truth behind the legends of the Blair Witch. They never returned but, a year later, their footage was found.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
programme.desc: Bella and Edward gather werewolves, vampires and other allies to help them protect their daughter from the Volturi.

programme.desc: After a former associate makes it his mission to end the Expendables, a man assembles a team of younger recruits to help take down their enemy.

programme.desc: We find out just how gifted psychic Elise Rainier is, she reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a teenage girl who is been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: A modern-day teenager is transported back to the 1950s, where he encounters his mother and father in their youth.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Time-travel sequel with Marty McFly and the eccentric inventor Doc Brown travelling back and forth in time to stop their nemesis tampering with history. By stealing the time machine and travelling back in time himself, Biff Tannen gives his younger self a book containing fifty years of sports statistics which he uses to amass an enormous gambling fortune and power.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: Marty McFly travels to the American Wild West of 1885 in a desperate bid to save Doc Brown from becoming another victim of a black-hatted gunslinger.

programme.title: Dead Shot
programme.desc: When a border ambush goes wrong, a retired Irish paramilitary witnesses the fatal shooting of his pregnant wife by an SAS officer. After outwitting the SAS, now presumed dead, he escapes, taking his revenge to the dark streets of 1970's London.

programme.title: Watcher
programme.desc: As a serial killer stalks the city, a young actress who just moved to town with her boyfriend notices a mysterious stranger watching her from across the street.

programme.title: It Is in Us All
programme.desc: A Londoner returns to his ancestral homeland of Donegal, Ireland and is drawn in by a teenager who almost kills him in a car crash.

programme.title: The Lost King
programme.desc: Guided by instinct and spectral visions, an ambitious writer and amateur historian defies the academic establishment to unearth Richard III's long-missing remains in a Leicester car park.

programme.title: Linoleum
programme.desc: Cameron Edwin, the host of a failing TV science show, has always had aspirations of being an astronaut. When a fallen satellite from space lands in his backyard, his midlife crisis manifests into a plan to rebuild the machine into a rocket.

programme.title: Paradise Highway
programme.desc: To save the life of her brother, truck driver Sally reluctantly agrees to smuggle illicit cargo -- a girl named Leila. As Sally and Leila begin a danger-fraught journey across state lines, a dogged FBI operative sets out on their trail to save them.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: In the 1800s, Gen. Nanisca trains a group of all-female warriors to protect the African kingdom of Dahomey from a foreign enemy that's determined to destroy their way of life.

programme.desc: Fearing the apocalypse, an insurance salesman embarks on a solo hunting experiment, only to face a traumatic incident.

programme.title: Seriously Red
programme.desc: After reaching a crossroads in her life, an estate agent decides to trade in her career for one in the spotlight. She pursues her dream and finds success as a Dolly Parton impersonator.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: In the 1800s, Gen. Nanisca trains a group of all-female warriors to protect the African kingdom of Dahomey from a foreign enemy that's determined to destroy their way of life.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: In an alternate 1985 America, costumed super heroes are part of everyday life. When one of his former comrades is murdered, masked vigilante Rorschach uncovers a plot to kill and discredit all past and present super heroes. As he reconnects with his retired associates, only one of which has true powers, Rorschach glimpses a far-reaching conspiracy involving their shared past and catastrophic consequences for the world's future.

programme.title: Hellraiser
programme.desc: Clive Barker's graphic tale of an Oriental puzzle box which opens the door to a dimension of pain and torture.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Following a double corneal transplant, a concert violinist perceives frightening images of a world that only she can see.

programme.title: The 90's: Cinema's Greatest Decade
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity superfans return to the 90s to relive the decade's greatest cinema, with the biggest blockbusters, hilarious laughs and sensational superstars.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future society, people are divided into factions based on their personalities. After a young woman learns she is a Divergent and will never fit into any one group, she uncovers a conspiracy to destroy all those like her.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin, where they get more than they bargained for, discovering the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: Set in the dark and forbidding Hill House, the scene of numerous gruesome tragedies. When a group assembles there for a sleep disorder study, they soon become entangled in the supernatural history of the house.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: In the near future, the US Navy develops a fighter jet piloted by an artificial intelligence computer. The jet is placed on an aircraft carrier in the Pacific to learn combat manoeuvres from the human pilots aboard, but when the computer develops a mind of its own, it's the humans who are charged with stopping it before it incites a war.

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: The government and a group of religious extremists pursue a man and his son, a young boy who possesses special powers.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Rome's Colosseum explodes, London's pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planet's core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earth's engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.title: Super 8
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, while making a movie, a group of friends witness a catastrophic train crash and soon suspect that this was no accident. Soon after the crash, the small Ohio town experiences some unusual disappearances and inexplicable events. It is up to the local Deputy to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: In an alternate 1985 America, costumed super heroes are part of everyday life. When one of his former comrades is murdered, masked vigilante Rorschach uncovers a plot to kill and discredit all past and present super heroes. As he reconnects with his retired associates, only one of which has true powers, Rorschach glimpses a far-reaching conspiracy involving their shared past and catastrophic consequences for the world's future.

programme.title: Smile
programme.desc: After witnessing a traumatic incident, Dr. Cotter starts experiencing frightening occurrences that she can't explain. As an overwhelming terror begins taking over her life, she must confront her troubling past to escape her horrifying new reality.

programme.title: Hellraiser
programme.desc: Clive Barker's graphic tale of an Oriental puzzle box which opens the door to a dimension of pain and torture.

programme.title: Bodies Bodies Bodies
programme.desc: When a group of 20-somethings gets stuck at a remote mansion during a hurricane, a party game gone very, very wrong ends with a dead body on the ground and fake friends at every turn as they try to find the killer among them.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: A couple hide their daughter from a shadowy agency that wants to harness her gift for turning fire into a weapon. When a mysterious operative finally finds the family, he tries to seize the girl once and for all, but she has other plans.

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: Set in the dark and forbidding Hill House, the scene of numerous gruesome tragedies. When a group assembles there for a sleep disorder study, they soon become entangled in the supernatural history of the house.

programme.title: Super 8

Soon after the crash, the small Ohio town experiences some unusual disappearances and inexplicable events. It is up to the local Deputy to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Survivors of Earth's second Ice Age live out their days on a luxury train that ploughs through snow and ice. The train's poorest residents, who live in the squalid caboose, plan to improve their lot by taking over the engine room.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: Smile
programme.desc: After witnessing a traumatic incident, Dr. Cotter starts experiencing frightening occurrences that she can't explain. As an overwhelming terror begins taking over her life, she must confront her troubling past to escape her horrifying new reality.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Adam and Lawrence wake up to find themselves chained up in a dirty washroom, and there is a corpse lying between them. Their captor is a madman known as the Jigsaw, whose game is to force his captives to hurt themselves or each other in order to stay alive. The two must find a way to escape and rescue Lawrence's family, who have been taken hostage.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: Eight strangers find themselves locked inside a house with a deadly nerve agent coursing through their veins. One of them is Daniel Matthews, the teenage son of Detective Eric Matthews. Can Eric save his son from the game-playing Jigsaw before the two-hour deadline, and Daniel, expires?

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: A couple hide their daughter from a shadowy agency that wants to harness her gift for turning fire into a weapon. When a mysterious operative finally finds the family, he tries to seize the girl once and for all, but she has other plans.

programme.title: Anon
programme.desc: In the near future, private memories are recorded and crime has almost ceased to exist. But in trying to solve a series of murders, troubled detective Sal Frieland stumbles upon a young woman known only `The Girl'. She has no identity, no history and is invisible to the cops. Sal realises this may not be the end of crime, but the beginning.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: People were forced to leave Earth a millennium ago to establish a new home on Nova Prime. Now, Gen. Cypher Raige (Will Smith) heads Nova Prime's most-prominent family. Cypher's teenage son, Kitai (Jaden Smith), feels enormous pressure to follow in his father's legendary footsteps -- which strains their relationship. Cypher and Kitai set out on a trip to mend their bond, but when their craft crashes on Earth's hostile surface, each must trust the other greatly -- or perish.

programme.title: The Fog
programme.desc: The small fishing community Antonio Bay is suddenly plagued by a strange, glowing fog. From the fog the ghosts of people killed 100 years ago appears to seek their revenge on the little community who sentenced them to death.

programme.title: Æon Flux
programme.desc: Aeon lives in a world restricted to the last city on Earth, after a plague has destroyed the rest of the world. The city is ruled by a council and its chairman, and people are mysteriously disappearing. Aeon is an assassin for an underground group of rebels called the Monicans, and is assigned to remove the Chairman, but at the last minute she finds herself unable to do it.

programme.title: Snowpiercer

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: A man and his sister discover something sinister in the skies above their California horse ranch, while the owner of a nearby theme park tries to profit from the mysterious, otherworldly phenomenon.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Three student film-makers, Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard and Mike Williams, set off into the woods near Burkitsville, Maryland, in search of the truth behind the legends of the Blair Witch. They never returned but, a year later, their footage was found.

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: A kidnapped doctor must keep dying Jigsaw alive while a fellow victim completes his own maniacal test. It's a race against time to keep Jigsaw alive.

programme.title: Saw IV
programme.desc: Even after death, Jigsaw still plays his grisly games. A tape found in the psycho's stomach sends a cop on a bloody trail.

programme.title: Saw VI

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: An immature 40-year-old convinces his childhood pals to join him in finishing an epic pub-crawl started 20 years previously. As they make their way toward their final destination, a battle for mankind emerges.

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live' skit.

programme.title: Hot Rod

Brennan Huff and Dale Doback still live with their respective parents, despite being grown men, and when the inevitable happens and Nancy and Robert move in together, the two middle-aged `boys' are forced to share a room.

programme.desc: Stoner Dale Denton's enjoyment of a rare strain of marijuana may prove fatal when he drops his roach in a panic after witnessing a murder. programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Disgraced FBI agents Marcus and Kevin go to bizarre lengths to catch a devious millionaire. Together, the former classmates encounter shootouts, espionage and double-crosses while trying to prevent worldwide chaos.

programme.desc: Released from prison after seven years, a man learns that his beloved mother is in desperate need of a liver transplant. With no other options, he soon decides to break a few more laws to get her to the top of the transplant list and save her life.

programme.desc: A successful author finds herself in a horrifying reality and must figure out the mystery behind it before it is too late.

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: After purchasing a brownstone in New York, a thirty-something divorced woman and her daughter are forced to take advantage of the hidden room - the `panic room' - when intruders break into their home. However, they soon find that what the intruders want is locked in the panic room with them.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: A boy's life is endangered after he stumbles across vital information about a politician's murder. His lawyer is the only person offering protection from the unwanted attentions of the Mob and the FBI, but is she capable of saving his life?

programme.desc: During the summer months, a mother brown bear struggles to find food for her two cubs and a pair of lynx kittens venture away from their den; honeybees pollinate flowers.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: When Hope suffers a personal tragedy, her makeshift family rallies around her and steps up to release the few remaining animals.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf and swim alongside a stealthy manta ray, dolphins and a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan
programme.desc: Say hello to baby orangutan Topan, a newbie orphan in need of a surrogate mum, then meet 6-year-old Kasper as he busily prepares for graduation.

programme.title: Wild Israel
programme.desc: Bird Migration is one of the major, most striking and wonderful natural phenomena that exists in the world. Billions of birds maintain a constant migration route from their winter home to their summer home and back.

programme.title: Arctic From Above
programme.desc: Join Liz Bonnin as she travels to one Earth's last great wildernesses to reveal fresh insights about its animals.

programme.title: Arctic From Above
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin comes face-to-face with caribou, abseils down a cliff to study gyrfalcons, and helps catch seals in Svalbard.

programme.title: Arctic From Above
programme.desc: Join Liz Bonnin as she discovers how plastic pollution is affecting seabirds, encounters a bison and learns how climate change is impacting bears and beavers.

programme.title: Rooted
programme.desc: In the Afromontane forests of the Soutpansberg grows a giant Outeniqua Yellowwood. A look at how this colossal tree hosts, feeds and shelters an array of plants and animals in the bows of her branches.

programme.title: Rooted
programme.desc: The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Wild City
programme.desc: This documentary explores Singapore's hidden wilderness featuring overlooked areas of the island that are home to a variety of fascinating creatures, such as the flying colugo, the wild boar in Pulau Ubin, and the saltwater crocodile and a family of smooth-coated otters in Sungai Buloh. There are some other interesting wild creatures in Singapore, such as the elusive Suda Pangolin, the monitor lizard (the largest lizard on the island), and the white bellied sea eagle.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Wild City
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough uncovers the unseen natural treasures of Singapore and explores how the wildlife has adapted to the human world.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: When Hope suffers a personal tragedy, her makeshift family rallies around her and steps up to release the few remaining animals.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf and swim alongside a stealthy manta ray, dolphins and a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea
programme.desc: As an abandoned seal pup navigates heavy storms and hungry predators, hares fight for females, brent geese prepare to fly to the high Arctic and more.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea
programme.desc: While shell ducks forage and defend their home, young rabbits discover they're not safe and spoonbills fight over nests.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea
programme.desc: A period of calm weather dries out the Wadden Sea area. But a devastating storm is coming, and fierce sandstorms threaten to bury spoon chicks alive on the beach.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea
programme.desc: In this final episode, migratory birds arrive in search of berries, little swans arrive in the sweetest part of the Wadden area and starlings fly in beautiful formations.

programme.title: Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet's biggest biomass migration, as billions of sardines migrate along South Africa's east coast, each hoping to escape the jaws of hungry predators.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Journey to the harsh Okavango Delta as the Matata Pride do battle with wildfires and flooding in a high-stakes fight to keep their cubs alive.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators
programme.desc: A wolf pack in the Carpathian Mountains raise their young, the red deer rut commences and a fire salamander searches for a place to hibernate.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: This series details the treasures in the vital ecosystems of the underwater world. Here the dune kingdoms of the Aliwal Shoal and Sodwana Bay are explored.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: On South Africa's west coast, cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that can't swim, it is challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Journey to the harsh Okavango Delta as the Matata Pride do battle with wildfires and flooding in a high-stakes fight to keep their cubs alive.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators
programme.desc: A wolf pack in the Carpathian Mountains raise their young, the red deer rut commences and a fire salamander searches for a place to hibernate.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: Just off the Tanzanian coastline lies an island Utopia. Its diverse habitats provide homes for a multitude of creatures living above the water and below. And when the time is right, a mysterious being rises from the deep to feed in the rich waters. This is Mafia Island.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: In one of Africa's greatest lakes, rock and water set the stage for evolution's most magnificent display. The story of this remarkable example of evolution in action, as well as a look at how the lake provides for a range of life, both above and below the surface.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: Off the coast of Mozambique, warm water surrounds idyllic islands. In this shallow realm, sunlight fuels abundant growth. Rich sea currents carry food and inundate underwater meadows. Life in many forms crowds the space between seabed and surface.

programme.title: The Predator's Playbook
programme.desc: An exploration of the unique features that allow predators to survive in often hostile environments,. such as speed and agility to undetectable camouflage.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk
programme.desc: On the first day of spring in Australia, spring fever runs rife as kangaroos box, koalas woo, and a surprisingly fast perentie lizard seeks out its weekly meal.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk
programme.desc: As the rainy season kicks off in Madagascar, exploring a day in the lives of ring-tailed lemurs and colourful chameleons.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk
programme.desc: The sun rules everything on this arid peninsula, especially in July. But those who call this desert home, such as camels, lizards and rock hyraxes, have adapted to beat the heat.

programme.title: Rewilding
programme.desc: The European bison once roamed most of the old world, but were hunted to extinction by the early twentieth century. Only by ambitious rewilding undertakings is it possible to see these fascinating animals in their natural habitats again.

programme.title: Rewilding
programme.desc: The Steinhuder Meer in the heart of northern Germany is a biodiversity hotspot. The richly textured landscape is the ideal outdoor laboratory for biologists who operate Germany's significant reintroduction of wildlife.

programme.title: Rewilding
programme.desc: Andalusia is a mosaic of extreme habitats. Over the course of history, human settling and hunting had a fundamental impact on these landscapes and their fauna.

programme.title: The Predator's Playbook
programme.desc: An exploration of the unique features that allow predators to survive in often hostile environments,. such as speed and agility to undetectable camouflage.

programme.title: Wild Israel
programme.desc: The Negev desert spreads over more than half of Israel. It is an extreme desert that lies within the Subtropical ridge.The film shines light on the secret life of the unique plants and animals in the area.

programme.title: Wild Israel
programme.desc: The Judea Desert is a small local desert that drops in its east-end into the Dead Sea, the lowest sea in the world. The tall Judean Mountains, block the humidity coming from the Mediterranean Sea from reaching the Judean desert.

programme.title: Wild Israel
programme.desc: At the south-most end of Israel, the intersection of Jordan, Egypt and Saudi Arabia, Desert Mountains drop into a deep blue sea. The Eilat bay is the northeast point of the Red Sea. In its water a spectacular reef and to its shores an arid desert. In both worlds, land and sea, we will discover an intricate world of plants and animals that live alongside each other in a delicate status quo.

programme.title: David Attenborough's First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough journeys across the globe to discover how the earliest animals developed on our planet. Attenborough meets expert fossil hunters, and sees on-site some of the most remarkable finds that have transformed our understanding of the first animal life forms, including the first set of eyes and teeth and the first predators and parasites.

programme.title: David Attenborough's First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough's journey continues in Canada's Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. Travelling on to North Africa, the rainforests of Australia and the east coast of Scotland, Attenborough discovers how animals evolved to conquer not only the oceans but also the land and air.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Even giant animals start out small, and the likes of elephants, gorillas, rhinos and bison have some of the cutest babies in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: When Hope suffers a personal tragedy, her makeshift family rallies around her and steps up to release the few remaining animals.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue
programme.desc: Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands and swim with bottlenose dolphins, predatory orcas and short-tailed stingrays on the hunt.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North America's largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterised by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River, flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3000 kilometres northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: It's November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. The ice, which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now, is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue
programme.desc: Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands and swim with bottlenose dolphins, predatory orcas and short-tailed stingrays on the hunt.

programme.desc: Arthur faces his first true test as King when he incurs the wrath of the formidable Queen Annis. With the lives of thousands hanging in the balance, Arthur must find the strength to be his own man and become the leader Camelot so desperately needs.

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: When Merlin falls into Morgana's hands, he becomes a deadly weapon in her fight for supremacy. Using ancient magic, she pits friend against friend to create the perfect assassin. An oblivious Arthur is in great danger. Will anyone notice Merlin's unusual behaviour before he does the king some serious harm?

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: Morgana joins forces with the enigmatic wizard Alator to uncover a secret that could change the course of destiny. With allies on both sides of the castle walls, can anyone stop her before Merlin's greatest secret is revealed?

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: A mysterious illness draws Merlin to a distant village. However, it soon becomes clear that there is more at stake than just his patients' well-being as something sinister turns the air sour. Far from home and with no-one to trust, Merlin becomes embroiled in a deadly game of cat and mouse. No longer sure who is the hunter and who is the hunted, can the young warlock survive long enough to uncover the truth?

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: When Sir Lancelot returns from the dead, old feelings reignite. Gwen must fight temptation before she commits an unspeakable act of betrayal, one that would destroy the legacy of Camelot forever. With heads and hearts thrown into turmoil, Merlin becomes suspicious. Can a man really defy death, or is there something more sinister at play?

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: The Camelot Knights stumble across an eerie shrine deep in the forest, its chilling atmosphere betraying a dark history best left undisturbed. However, when Elyan ignores Merlin's warning, his actions spark a chain of events more frightening than anyone could possibly have imagined. Can a grievous wrong be put right? Or will past demons change the future forever?

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: Morgana finds a powerful ally in the Southron warlord Helios. Together they hatch the perfect plan to force Camelot to its knees. With the kingdom - and Arthur - preoccupied by the arrival of the beautiful Princess Mithian, it falls to an absent friend to raise the alarm: Guinevere. However, with past wounds still raw, can love really conquer all? Or is a deadly arrow destined to fly straight into the heart of Camelot?

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: With Morgana at the helm of a vast Southron army, a deadly net is closing in around Camelot. Can Merlin save the King from Morgana's clutches, or has Arthur's luck finally run out?

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: Morgana and Helios have successfully captured Camelot, and Merlin and Arthur are outlaws on the run. Only Merlin can restore his faith, and only an extraordinary act can prove to the King that he was born to rule.

programme.desc: When a hit-and-run patient is murdered, the attending doctor is placed under immediate suspicion. The mysterious Della, who has connections to a horse-doping ring, falls for the doctor and helps him to clear his name.

programme.desc: Two friends, Linda Mitchell and Rosemary Clayton, are accused of conspiring to shoplift a dress from Hombards Boutique in Fulchester. As the drama continues, it is unclear if the claims made against the two women will tarnish their plea of innocence.

programme.desc: A reporter learns that his brother, a student at Cambridge, has killed himself, or so it seems.

programme.desc: Absorbing period melodrama set in 1890s Brighton about an autocratic chemist and public analyst who rules his wife, daughters and son David with iron discipline. David, whose attempts at romance are thwarted by his father, seeks solace in a pub where he becomes dangerously infatuated with landlord's wife.

programme.title: Brighton Rock
programme.desc: In 1940s Brighton, England, a vicious criminal Pinkie Brown is the leader of a small-time gang. After he murders a rival, he find an alibi through a waitress whom he proposes to marry in return for her corroboration. Despite police ruling the murder an accident, a woman who was with Brown before the murder continues her own investigation. Meanwhile, Brown is rapidly losing his grip on the situation.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: A quest for gold puts Templar, a seductive girl and her swindler father in the middle of an escalating revolution in Latin America.

programme.title: Rumpole of the Bailey

programme.title: White Cargo
programme.desc: A civil servant steps in to save strippers from the clutches of evil white slavers.

programme.title: Ensign O'Toole

programme.desc: A music hall chorus girl blackmails a gentleman after seeing him leave his house with another dancer who was found later murdered. Instead of accepting money she demands to be invited to the man's stately home to experience the life of a lady.

programme.desc: In post-WWII Britain, an American fashion journalist, her ex-army fiancé, and a gang of honest tough guys from a local gym attempt to bring black market organised crime to justice.

programme.desc: Two friends, Linda Mitchell and Rosemary Clayton, are accused of conspiring to shoplift a dress from Hombards Boutique in Fulchester. It is now up to Linda and Rosemary to persuade a jury that they are innocent.

programme.title: The Flaw
programme.desc: A sneaky race-car driver wants to kill his wife, the heiress. Unfortunately her attorney, who is in love with her, discovers the plan. The driver details his elaborate plan to kill them both.

programme.title: Time to Remember
programme.desc: Review of the events in 1922 including Irish Troubles, war between Greece and Turkey, and developments in aviation and radio. Narrated by Sir Michael Redgrave.

programme.title: Sewers of Gold
programme.desc: Directed by Francis Megahy and stars Ian McShane, Christopher Matthew and Warren Clarke. A group of fascists plan to finance their work by pulling off a bank robbery.

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Maguire disguises himself as a tramp in order to track down an organised gang of car thieves operating in Hertfordshire.

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: A night full of horror and fright awaits the cellar dwellers, this time around. Caroline Munro introduces the 1973 horror film `Theatre of Blood' starring Vincent Price and Diana Rigg.

programme.title: Theatre of Blood
programme.desc: An entertaining tale about the demise of several British theatre critics whose murderer draws inspiration from Shakespeare's plays. The finger of suspicion points at ham actor Edward Lionheart, regularly overlooked for acting awards in the past because of his insistence on appearing only in works by the bard. The problem for the police is that their prime suspect very publicly committed suicide some time ago.

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro introduces the second horror film of the evening, `Scream and Scream Again'. The 1970 film stars Vincent Price and famed horror duo Christopher Lee and Peter Cushing.

programme.title: Scream and Scream Again
programme.desc: While a serial killer with a penchant for drinking his victim's blood runs rampant, the murderous and deranged Dr Browning engages in harvesting body parts to conduct his experiments.

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Last, but certainly not least is the horror film, `The Dunwich Horror'. Caroline Munro introduces the strange 1970 work starring Sandra Dee and Dean Stockwell in the fictional town of Dunwich.

programme.title: The Dunwich Horror
programme.desc: A psychotic New Englander plots to sacrifice a coed to the devil in this adaptation of HP Lovecraft's story.

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline closes the doors but not before providing a sneak-peak of next week's films.

programme.title: The Velvet Trap
programme.desc: The tragic story of a young woman and her endless experiences of terrible misfortune.

programme.title: Look at Life
programme.desc: A 1960s look at Fair Isle, situated halfway between mainland Shetland and the Orkney islands, famous for its distinctive woollens. It faces a problem, with two thirds of the inhabitants being men.

programme.title: Target: The Corruptors
programme.desc: Flood goes undercover to get the goods on Claude Ivy, a crew boss accused of mistreating migrant farm workers.

programme.title: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: An ambitious reporter and a secretary uncover shady operations of gangsters and crooked politicians.

programme.title: The Crater Lake Monster
programme.desc: The tranquility of a mountain community is shattered when a meteorite awakens a prehistoric lake creature.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: Upon Marian's pleas, Robin attempts to stop Prince John from divorcing his wife and marrying a French lady.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sir Lancelot
programme.desc: A young man seeks to take the place of a recently deceased knight of the round table, competing in a tournament for the honour.

programme.title: Calamity The Cow
programme.desc: Farmer Grant's children get him to buy a cow from another farmer. The children work hard to make the cow fit and healthy enough for the show ring. But at the last minute another farmer steals Calamity.

programme.title: The Buccaneers
programme.desc: Word comes through that a promised shipload of women is approaching New Providence. Tempest and the island administration have a concern that Blackbeard may be coming.

programme.title: The Phantom Empire
programme.desc: Gene saves the Queen and locks Argo and his men in the room with the death ray which gets out of control.

programme.title: Creature With the Atom Brain
programme.desc: A mad ex-Nazi scientist creates atomic zombies to help an exiled American gangster return to power.

programme.title: The Outer Limits
programme.desc: An amusement park attraction turns out to be an actual spaceship commandeered by an alien captain (Simon Oakland).

programme.title: Fireball XL5
programme.desc: On planet Rejusca, Steve and Zoonie must rescue Venus from sun worshippers who plan to sacrifice her to their solar deity.

programme.title: The Pirates of Malaysia
programme.desc: A Malaysian rebel teams up with a group of renegades to battle a British general who is trying to force the king to resign.

programme.title: At the Earth's Core
programme.desc: A Victorian era scientist and his assistant take a test run in their Iron Mole drilling machine and end up in a strange underground labyrinth ruled by a species of giant telepathic bird and full of prehistoric monsters and cavemen.

programme.title: In Suspicious Circumstances
programme.desc: A detailed look at two mysterious unsolved cases; the murders of Helen Puttock and Rose Harsent.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret investigates the lives of three apparently model citizens after casually observing some unusual behaviour.

programme.title: The Four Just Men
programme.desc: Rico must hide an American gangster in his hotel when the latter agrees to become an informer against his former colleagues in crime.

programme.title: The Bedroom Window
programme.desc: Architect Terry Lambert embarks on a risky affair with his boss's wife Sylvia Wentworth but one night, standing at the bedroom window, she sees a woman being attacked outside. To reveal her evidence would also reveal the affair so Lambert goes to the police, but his conflicting statements leave him under suspicion for both the attack and a subsequent murder. He must prove his innocence by tracking down the real perpetrator.

programme.title: The Third Secret
programme.desc: A prominent London psychologist seems to have taken his own life, causing stunned disbelief amongst his colleagues and patients. His teenage daughter refuses to believe it was suicide, as this would go against all of the principles which her father stood for.

programme.title: The Young Don't Cry
programme.desc: At a Georgia home for troubled orphans, Les sticks up for meek kids and endures taunts from bullies. When Les meets Rudy, a convict in a local chain gang who's sympathetic to the young outsider, their lives are forever changed.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: In a staid English seaside town after the Second World War, young Lynda grows up with her widowed father and younger sister. She eventually becomes pregnant by an acquaintance of her father.

programme.title: Crazy Days
programme.desc: A compilation of British and American silent comedy featuring some of the biggest names from the era, including sketches with silent era stars Buster Keaton, Charlie Chaplin, and Roscoe Arbuckle.

programme.title: Men of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Exploring the benefits of the Boys Brigade youth organisation, with a glimpse of how it brought discipline and structure to the boys' lives through camping and other outdoor activities.

programme.title: Captain Scarlett
programme.desc: An eponymous nobleman returns home from the Napoleonic Wars only to find the evil Duke de Corlaine has stolen his lands and is oppressing his people. With the help of Pierre DuCloux, he forms a gang of outlaws to fight injustice, finding time along the way to rescue the beautiful Princess Maria from the clutches of the wicked Count Villiers.

programme.title: The Madame Gambles
programme.desc: The owner of a dress shop gambles the shop away to her bookie who inherits, not only the shop, but the manager.

programme.title: Overland Pacific
programme.desc: A railroad investigator tries to find the reason behind constant attacks on the railway.

programme.title: Bus Stop
programme.desc: Stranded at a snowbound bus stop, a love-struck cowboy chases a vulnerable saloon singer. When she turns him down, he kidnaps her and takes her to his hometown of Montana.

programme.title: Terror by Night
programme.desc: When the legendary Star of Rhodesia diamond is stolen and a man is murdered on a train from London to Edinburgh, Sherlock Holmes attempts to discover which of the passengers is the culprit.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: Robin steps in and poses as a woman's husband when she is in danger of losing her estate because her husband has not returned.

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Ada insists on a new vacuum cleaner. She must hide the purchase from Alf after a visit from a persuasive salesman.

programme.title: Road to Bali
programme.desc: Two crooners anxious to dodge marriage proposals sign on as deep-sea divers. They discover sunken treasure and fall for the same girl - fabulous Balinese princess Lala.

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: Mike Read joins Talking Pictures TV founder Noel Cronin on his quest to track down old films, footage and programmes. They investigate footage from film cans found in lofts and garages and discuss locations, studios and all things film.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: An astrologer's prediction of danger for Templar comes true while Simon is impersonating a diamond-cutter to retrieve a stolen jewel.

programme.title: Mr. Hulot's Holiday
programme.desc: Jacques Tati's tale of a blundering bachelor who unwittingly wreaks havoc during his holiday at a French summer resort.

programme.title: Automatic Fare Collection and You
programme.desc: An extremely patronising film made on behalf of London Transport to inform the general public how to properly use their tickets to operate automatic gates at stations, new at the time.

programme.title: Van der Valk
programme.desc: A young thief becomes wealthy and appears to have connections in high places, Van der Valk must find out how the miracle occurred.

programme.title: The Snorkel
programme.desc: A teen suspects that her wealthy mother's suicide was a cleverly planned murder by her stepfather, and that he killed her father previously as well.

programme.title: The Long Night
programme.desc: Tragedy looms when a war veteran and a magician vie for the love of the same woman.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: A murderous lunatic escapes incarceration and returns to his home town intent on reliving his crime. Fifteen years before, on Halloween night, the boy had forsaken trick-or-treating to viciously stab his sister to death. Now he is pursued by the doctor who has pronounced him to be evil personified. John Carpenter Donald Pleasence Jamie Lee Curtis Nancy Kyes P.J. Soles Charles Cyphers Kyle Richards Brian Andrews Arthur Malet Debra Hill John Carpenter Moustapha Akkad Irwin Yablans Kool Lusby.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes in Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson hunt for three music boxes containing directions to the whereabouts of six valuable engraving plates stolen from the Bank of England. They find themselves in competition with professional thieves also out to find the clues, which were hidden by a spiteful jailbird before the music boxes went up for auction. Roy William Neill Basil Rathbone Nigel Bruce Patricia Morison Edmund Breon Frederick Worlock Carl Harbord Patricia Cameron Tom Dillon Harry Cording Topsy Glyn Mary Gordon Ian Wolfe Lillian Bronson Roy William Neill.

programme.title: Off Set
programme.desc: In this exclusive interview, musician Jamie Cullum talks all about his career in the film industry which has included writing music on the soundtrack for `Gran Torino'.

programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: A collection of intimate portraits of some of the biggest names in Hollywood, including actors, film directors and producers.

programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: With two Oscars and three Golden Globes, the famous actor makes stardom look easy, but his success arrived after years of hard work.

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: Film-maker Alan Parker talks about his career, which has included directing `Bugsy Malone', `Midnight Express' and `Pink Floyd - The Wall'. Karl Levin Mark Kaplan.

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: Insightful interview with the Canadian director. Norman Jewison's career spans six decades and includes directing credits for `The Hurricane' and `Fiddler on the Roof'. George Papuashvili, Karl Levin, David Freydt Mark Kaplan David Freydt.

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: Rob Reiner who starred in `The Wolf of Wall Street,' directed `When Harry Met Sally' and wrote `This is Spinal Tap' gives a candid interview about his Hollywood career. Rob Reiner.

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: Film-maker George Lucas talks about his career, which has included `THX 1138', `American Graffiti' and `Star Wars'. George Lucas.

programme.title: TCM Shorts
programme.desc: A special look behind the scenes with comedian, director and actor Ben Miller.

programme.title: Sierra Passage
programme.desc: A boy is adopted by a travelling show, after the murder of his father, only to become a talented sharpshooter with revenge on his mind. Frank McDonald Wayne Morris Lola Albright Alan Hale Jr.

programme.title: King of the Wild Stallions
programme.desc: When a young widow, Diane Brewster, and her son encounter trouble on their remote ranch, help arrives in the unusual form of a wild stallion. R. G. Springsteen George Montgomery Diane Brewster Edgar Buchanan Emile Meyer Jerry Hartleben Byron Foulger Denver Pyle Dan Sheridan.

programme.title: Day of the Evil Gun
programme.desc: A man persuades his ex-gunfighter neighbour to help him track down the Apaches who kidnapped his wife and children. The pair hire an eccentric scout and set off on a challenging journey in which they encounter bandits, Indian raiders, and soldiers of equal savagery. Jerry Thorpe Glenn Ford Arthur Kennedy Dean Jagger John Anderson Paul Fix Nico Minardos Harry Dean Stanton Pilar Pellicer Parley Baer Royal Dano Ross Elliott Barbara Babcock James Griffith Jerry Thorpe.

programme.title: Guns for San Sebastian
programme.desc: In mid-18th-century Mexico, rebel bandit León Alastray escapes from government troops by taking sanctuary in a church. When Father Joseph refuses to turn him over to the authorities, the old priest is sent to the remote village of San Sebastián as punishment. Disguised in a friar's robes, Alastray joins Father Joseph. After Father Joseph has been killed by a bandit, the villagers mistake Alastray for a priest. Henri Verneuil Anthony Quinn Anjanette Comer Charles Bronson Sam Jaffe Silvia Pinal Jorge Martínez de Hoyos Jacques Bar.

programme.title: Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: Fictionalised account of the engagements that ensued when the Germans went on the counter-offensive in the Ardennes in late 1944. The main players in the tactical contest include a war-obsessed German tank commander, a US intelligence chief, and an officer who, though he constantly predicted such an attack, went unheeded. Ken Annakin Henry Fonda Robert Shaw Robert Ryan Dana Andrews George Montgomery Ty Hardin Pier Angeli Barbara Werle Charles Bronson Werner Peters Hans Christian Blech James MacArthur Telly Savalas Karl Otto Alberty Milton Sperling Philip Yordan Dino De Laurentiis Sidney Harmon.

programme.title: Destry Rides Again
programme.desc: Classic action-packed tale of a sheriff who lands the job of taming the unruly town of Bottleneck, even though he prefers to use anecdotes instead of gunplay to sort out disputes. However, his biggest problem turns out not to be the brawling townsfolk, but Frenchy, the local saloon's glamorous singer. George Marshall James Stewart Marlene Dietrich Mischa Auer Charles Winninger Brian Donlevy Allen Jenkins Warren Hymer Irene Hervey Una Merkel Billy Gilbert Samuel S. Hinds Joe Pasternak.

programme.title: The Hired Gun
programme.desc: A bounty hunter becomes convinced that the accused murderess in his care is innocent. Ray Nazarro Rory Calhoun Anne Francis Vince Edwards John Litel Chuck Connors Robert Burton Salvadore Baques Guinn \"Big Boy\" Williams Reg Parton Rory Calhoun Victor M. Orsatti.

programme.title: Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: Elizabeth I of England and her Catholic cousin, Mary Stuart, use political intrigue to manoeuvre for the English throne. Along the way they faces perilous and dangerous foes, each wanting their own chance of securing the throne. Charles Jarrott Vanessa Redgrave Glenda Jackson Patrick McGoohan Timothy Dalton Nigel Davenport Trevor Howard Daniel Massey Ian Holm Andrew Keir Tom Fleming Katherine Kath Beth Harris Frances White Hal B. Wallis.

programme.title: The Exorcist: The Version You've Never Seen
programme.desc: A famous actress calls upon medical science for help when her daughter begins behaving strangely, but without any success. Then, as bizarre and horrific incidents involving the daughter increase, her mother turns in desperation to the Church, and to a priest who doubts his own faith. William Friedkin Ellen Burstyn Linda Blair Max von Sydow Lee J. Cobb Kitty Winn Jack MacGowran Jason Miller Reverend William O'Malley Barton Heyman Peter Masterson Rudolf Schündler Gina Petrushka Robert Symonds Arthur Storch Reverend Thomas Bermingham Vasiliki Maliaros Titos Vandis Wallace Rooney Ron Faber Donna Mitchell Roy Cooper Robert Gerringer Mercedes McCambridge Noel Marshall William Peter Blatty.

programme.title: Passenger 57
programme.desc: An anti-terrorism expert, who has taken early retirement and is about to start a new life, unwittingly becomes involved in an aeroplane hijack. While en route to LA and a new job after his wife's death, he finds himself on the same flight as an FBI-escorted terrorist who is on his way to stand trial. When the terrorist's cohorts take control of the plane, only he can save the passengers and crew. Kevin Hooks Wesley Snipes Bruce Payne Tom Sizemore Alex Datcher Bruce Greenwood Robert Hooks Elizabeth Hurley Michael Horse Marc Macaulay Ernie Lively Lee Rich Dan Paulson Dylan Sellers Jonathan Sheinberg.

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Acclaimed futuristic chiller about two strait-laced businessmen who go to a theme park in which robots help them live out the adventures of their dreams. While taking part in a Wild West-style saloon shoot-out, one of the robots malfunctions, retaliating in high-noon fashion. Suddenly the men find their lives are in grave danger as they are stalked by a cowboy robot who will stop at nothing to eliminate them. Michael Crichton Yul Brynner Richard Benjamin James Brolin Norman Bartold Dick Van Patten Linda Gaye Scott Steve Franken Michael T. Mikler Terry Wilson Majel Roddenberry Anne Randall Julie Marcus Sharyn Wynters Anne Bellamy Chris Holter Charles Seel Wade Crosby Nora Marlowe Will J. White Ben Young Tom Falk Paul N. Lazarus III.

programme.title: Murder Most Foul
programme.desc: Amateur detective Miss Marple, the only member of a jury to vote `not guilty' in a murder trial, decides to find the real culprit on her own when a mistrial is declared. With her companion, Mr Stringer, she searches the home of the victim, and is led to a foundering repertory company headed by Driffold Cosgood. Posing as an actress, Miss Marple is accepted into the troupe. George Pollock Margaret Rutherford Ron Moody Bud Tingwell Andrew Cruickshank Megs Jenkins Dennis Price Ben Arbeid.

programme.desc: A special look behind the scenes with comedian, director and actor Ben Miller.

programme.title: Wartime Farm
programme.desc: The team tackle the conditions faced by British farmers in 1940, when the full impact of rationing took hold and which also saw Britain face the onslaught of Nazi bombing in the Blitz. Ruth finds out how about the impact rationing had in the kitchen as food became strictly limited, and also explores the temptations of the black market. Alex and Peter are confronted with vastly reduced supplies of feed for the animals.

programme.title: Secrets of Sex
programme.desc: As nations around the globe attempt to fight sex trafficking, many consider legalising prostitution. Two filmmakers travel across ten countries to explore the issue. UK to the USA.

programme.title: Darcey Bussell's Wild Coasts of Scotland

programme.title: Wartime Farm
programme.desc: The team tackle the conditions faced by British farmers in 1940, when the full impact of rationing took hold and which also saw Britain face the onslaught of Nazi bombing in the Blitz. Ruth finds out how about the impact rationing had in the kitchen as food became strictly limited, and also explores the temptations of the black market. Alex and Peter are confronted with vastly reduced supplies of feed for the animals.

programme.title: Country House Rescue
programme.desc: Albury Park is one of Surrey's most important and prestigious country houses, renowned for its great architecture, first by Sir John Soane and later by Augustus Pugin, who designed the Houses of Parliament. The Grade II listed Tudor mansion has one of the first cantilevered staircases and an amazing 63 individually designed chimneys. Nigel and Jennifer Whalley live at Albury Park and bought it four years ago.

programme.title: My Grandparents' War
programme.desc: Actor and peace campaigner Mark Rylance explores the extraordinary World War II story of his grandfather Osmond Skinner, who spent almost four years as a Japanese prisoner of war. Mark uncovers how Osmond, a banker for HSBC, bravely joined the Hong Kong Volunteer Defence Force with no military training and was thrown into a deadly battle to defend the island. Rylance's views on war are tested as he uncovers the real and shocking story of how Osmond survived Hong Kong's notorious POW camps.

programme.desc: It is spring and there are lambs and pigs to be delivered, which means Alex and Peter need to master animal midwifery. programme.title: Victorian Farm
programme.desc: The team embark on a trip by steam train, Ruth begins a tough task in the dairy, Alex tries his hand at bee-keeping, and the sheep get sheared using the latest time-saving technology. The lengthening summer days also allow Alex and Peter to try out the new Victorian sport of cricket.

programme.title: Victorian Farm
programme.desc: The team's year on the farm is coming to an end, but first they have to bring in the wheat harvest, the most crucial part of the Victorian Farm calendar. Alex and Peter must get to grips with a contraption that was state-of-the-art technology in Victorian times, the reaper binder. Meanwhile, Ruth explores the craft of straw plaiting and discovers the art of printing.

programme.title: Victorian Farm
programme.desc: It is spring and there are lambs and pigs to be delivered, which means Alex and Peter need to master animal midwifery. programme.title: My Grandparents' War
programme.desc: Helena explores the story of her maternal grandfather Eduardo Propper de Callejon. A Spanish diplomat, Eduardo defied his government's orders, and helped Jewish people escape the Holocaust as the Nazis invaded France. Helena learns that her paternal grandmother Lady Violet Bonham Carter also took her own stand against anti-Semitism. A mother of four and a liberal politician, Violet was ahead of her time, volunteering as an air raid warden and campaigning for women's rights.

programme.title: DIY SOS: The Big Build
programme.desc: The team and the Bromsgrove volunteers turn up to help Karis, who was diagnosed with cerebral palsy as a baby. Twenty eight years later, Karis still lives with her mum, Karen, but now her health is deteriorating and it's making caring for Karis almost impossible.

programme.desc: Amanda, mother of four children and wife to local builder Vic, was paralysed after a cycling accident while training for an Ironman triathlon, but she was determined to continue to compete as a para-athlete. Her home is now unsuitable for her, so the DIY SOS build volunteers come to the family's rescue.

programme.title: Great Indian Railway Journeys
